title: How to Be Good at Timesplitters 2 Virus Mode

steps.headline: Navigate to Virus Mode in the Arcade category.
Find a good weapon right after the game starts.
Search for a room with only one entrance.
If you can't find any, at least make sure you can see both entrances clearly at a time.
When a Virus tagged character comes, kill him.

text: Start up TimeSplitters 2.  Navigate to Virus Mode in the Arcade category.  Choose the desired players/bots.  Choose the desired options.  Find a good weapon right after the game starts.  Search for a room with only one entrance.  If you can't find any, at least make sure you can see both entrances clearly at a time.  Camp there.  When a Virus tagged character comes, kill him.  Do step 9 multiple times.
